responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "73D9B084476821DD475512ADB831706F", "Plague Doctors of Carphin were quick to discover the vehicle of propogation, ravens! This would give the new disease its name and call for the eradication of all Riverland ravens. However, a mutation seemed to have occurred in the raven population as a new more formidable breed of the fowl appeared. The new breed was the Blood Raven, a larger variant who fed upon the infected blood of the fallen by piercing the skin of the dead and siphoning off the toxic blood within. ")
name: MIDD_0016_TPP_Book_PlagueHistory_9
